Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Venom peptide 2-long (OdVP2L; analog of OdVP2; Insects, animals)
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the MCD family (Protonectin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Swiss_Prot Entry P86147]Fungi:Botrytis cinerea (MIC=0.5 µg/ml), Candida albicans (MIC=100 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacterium:S. aureus (MIC=25 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Swiss_Prot Entry P86147]has potent hemolytic activity against ovine erythrocytes at micromolar concentrations
Sequence Information.Function: Has potent hemolytic activity against ovine erythrocytes at micromolar concentrations.

Literature.Title: Isolation and molecular cloning of venom peptides from Orancistrocerus drewseni (Hymenoptera Eumenidae).
Literature.Author: Baek JH, Lee SH.

Literature.Title: Novel mastoparan and protonectin analogs isolated from a solitary wasp, Orancistrocerus drewseni drewseni.
Literature.Author: Murata K, Shinada T, Ohfune Y, Hisada M, Yasuda A, Naoki H, Nakajima T.
